data.text: My botmachine is running very slow
data.response: There could be many reasons why your botmachine is running slow. You can try closing any unnecessary programs and running a virus scan to see if that helps.
There could be many reasons why your botprinter isn't working. You can try checking the connections, restarting the botprinter, or reinstalling the drivers to see if that helps.
If you forgot your botmachinepassword, you can try resetting it by clicking on the 'Forgot botmachinepassword' link on the login page.

There could be many reasons why your botmachinenet connection keeps dropping. You can try resetting your router, checking your cables, or contacting your botmachinenet service provider to see if they can help.
